content:
Fleabag is an excellent choice! It's a critically acclaimed show that has gained a huge following, and for good reason. Phoebe Waller-Bridge's writing and performance are outstanding, and the show tackles complex themes with humor and heart.

I'm glad I could help you find some new shows to enjoy! Finishing a beloved series like The Office can be bittersweet, but it's always exciting to explore new stories and characters. If you need more recommendations or have any other questions, feel free to ask!

By the way, what did you think of the finale of The Office? Did it live up to your expectations?
